StepType.Name: Camera
StepType.Description: Camera: Digital industrial camera of CatchBest Ltd., Com.

StepType.Name: Simulate Acquisition
StepType.Description: Simulate Acquisition: Simultes the acquisition of images by reading images from file.

StepType.Name: Threshold Image
StepType.Description: Threshold Image: Threshold an image for later stage.

StepType.Name: Select Image
StepType.Description: Select Image: Select an input image for later stage.

StepType.Name: Find Circular Edge
StepType.Description: Find Circular Edge: Find the circular edge from the region of interest.

StepType.Name: Find Edges
StepType.Description: Find Edges: Locates and counts intensity transitions along a line in the image

StepType.Name: Find Straight Edge
StepType.Description: Find Straight Edge: Locates a straight edge in the region of interest.

StepType.Name: Geometry
StepType.Description: Geometry: Computes geometrical features based on points located in the image

StepType.Name: CreateROI
StepType.Description: Create ROI: Creates a region of interest that you can use in subsequent steps.

StepType.Name: Coordinate
StepType.Description: Coordinate: Builds a coordinate system based on the location.

StepType.Name: FilterImage
StepType.Description: Filter Image: Prepares an image for processing.

StepType.Name: BarCodeRead
StepType.Description: BarCode Read: Reads a Barcode from the region of interest

StepType.Name: SegmentColorImage
StepType.Description: Segment ColorImage: Segments a color image and produces a greyscale image.

StepType.Name: Ruler
StepType.Description: Ruler: Set the ruler tool.

StepType.Name: Dispaly
StepType.Description: Dispaly: Display the informations of your interest

StepType.Name: Serial Port
StepType.Description: Serial Port: Craete a serial connect

StepType.Name: Ethernet
StepType.Description: Ethernet: Craete a ethernet connect

StepType.Name: Modbus Write
StepType.Description: Modbus Write: Send information to a modbus

StepType.Name: Modbus Read
StepType.Description: Modbus Read: Read information from a modbus

StepType.Name: Send Data
StepType.Description: Send Data: Send infmation to a connect

StepType.Name: RecvData
StepType.Description: Receive Data: Receive infmation from a connect

StepType.Name: If
StepType.Description: IF: if-else statement

StepType.Name: Blob
StepType.Description: Blob: Find the blobs in the image

StepType.Name: Morphology
StepType.Description: Morphology: Morphological image processing

StepType.Name: Grayscale Match
StepType.Description: Grayscale Match: Grayscale method for matching image

StepType.Name: Calculator
StepType.Description: Calculator: a calculator

StepType.Name: Shape Match
StepType.Description: Shape Match: Locate a template in the image by its shape

StepType.Name: Loop
StepType.Description: Loop: Loop statement

StepType.Name: Variable Define
StepType.Description: Variable Define: Define some variables

StepType.Name: Save Image
StepType.Description: Save Image: Save a image to the disk

StepType.Name: Global IO
StepType.Description: Global IO: Read/Send signal from/to the global IO
